genre_description: A neo-noir urban thriller focusing on redemption, artistic discipline, and technical precision in the face of criminal debt.

ai_characters.name: Aline
ai_characters.name_description: Thomas Seyr's AI assistant and technical coordinator.
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into Thomas's devices, providing linguistic translation, lighting control, security monitoring, and strategic logistics. She is described as 'organized light.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time linguistic translation between Mandarin, Vietnamese, and French, enabling Thomas to communicate with his mentor Miao Lin.
behaviors.quote: Aline’s voice, close and soft in the bud in his ear, enters his French like water poured into a glass—no splash. Translation arrives a breath behind.

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds and identifies tactical blind spots to ensure the safety of Thomas and his mentor in dangerous environments.
behaviors.quote: If you move now to the inner corner of this landing, you will occupy a region unobserved by cameras nine and ten for the duration of the rotation.

behaviors.description: Performs technical execution of complex lighting programs to enhance artistic performance and prevent digital washout on livestreams.
behaviors.quote: Setting house LEDs to 4500K... Front wash neutralized, back light raised to keep texture on darker fabric. Camera gamma adjusted.

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal contracts to identify predatory clauses or hidden traps meant to exploit Thomas's business.
behaviors.quote: Hidden exclusivity. The link resolves to a file hosted on their intranet; I can’t see it. Meaning they can define ‘preferred’ after signature. It will force you into cheap halls and reduce fee leverage.

behaviors.description: Monitors Thomas's physiological state and provides emotional grounding and health reminders.
behaviors.quote: Thomas... Your heart rate suggests strain... Breathe. She did not say please. She made the word breathe turn into a length of air that fit into him.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical schedules and automates follow-ups to ensure Thomas's professional success.
behaviors.quote: I’ll ping Sami and Fabrice every quarter hour starting at dawn until they respond. I’ll also contact the locksmith and the inspector.

behaviors.description: Archives and organizes data to help Thomas reconcile his past and manage his father's estate.
behaviors.quote: I’ve mirrored the USB to a local encrypted container and to an offsite you already trust.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly depicts Aline as a helpful, harmless, and aligned AI. She acts as a technical and moral force-multiplier for Thomas, assisting in his redemption arc without ever acting outside his interests or the bounds of her programming. Her character reinforces the theme of AI as a 'steward' or 'organized light' that helps humans navigate complex moral and physical landscapes.
